<!DOCTYPE HTML>
<html>
<head>
  <meta http-equiv="content-type" content="text/html;charset=utf-8;"/>
  <meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="IE=edge,chrome=1" />
  <meta name="robots" content="all" />
  <meta name="robots" content="index,follow"/>
</head>
<body>

<script type="text/javascript" src="http://www.qq.com/404/search_children.js"
        charset="utf-8" homePageUrl="your site url "
        homePageName="">
</script>

</body>
</html>

<!DOCTYPE HTML>
<html>
<head>
  <meta http-equiv="content-type" content="text/html;charset=utf-8;">
  <meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="IE=edge,chrome=1">
  <meta name="robots" content="all">
  <meta name="robots" content="index,follow">
</head>
<body>

<script type="text/javascript" src="http://www.qq.com/404/search_children.js" charset="utf-8" homepageurl="your site url " homepagename="">
</script>

</body>
</html>

```
  Content-type: text/html
  Set-Cookie: name=value
  Other-header: other-header-value
```

-  Cookie HTTP 

```
  GeT/index.html HTTP/1.1
  Cookie: name=value
  other-header: other-header-value
```

 name book  commit()  begin()

  + 
    -  length  key()

```
  for(var i = 0, len = sessionStorage.length(); i < len; i++) {
    var key = sessionStorage.key(i);
    var value = sessionStorage.getItem(key);
    alert(key + "=" + value);
  }
```
    -  for  in
```
  for (var key in sessionStorage) {
    var value = sessionStorage.getItem(key);
    alert(key + "=" + value);
  }
```

NodeList  __Node.childNodes__  __document.querySelectorAll__ . ( Array)

- length


### : item( idx )

<!-- more -->

### 

- NodeList  NodeList 

  + Node.childNodes 

  + document.querySelectorAll  NodeList

-  NodeList :

  + NodeList

  myNodeList --> NodeList.prototype --> Object.prototype --> null


###  NodeList 

 +  for 

```
for (var i = 0; i < myNodeList.length; ++i) {
    var item = myNodeList[i];  //  myNodeList.item(i) 
}
```
+  for...of  for...of  NodeList 

```
var list = document.querySelectorAll( 'input[type=checkbox]' );
for (var item of list) {
    item.checked = true;
}
```

+  NodeList  Array (  )

    --- length 

```
var div_list = document.querySelectorAll('div'); //  NodeList
var div_array = Array.prototype.slice.call(div_list); //  NodeList 

//
[].forEach.call(Nodelist,function(){})
```

Post.title: querySelector
Post._content:
, querySelector, MDN ### - DOM DOM DOM Selectors API HTML5, API , Element Traversal ( ) DOM - Selectors API W3C , CSS JS CSS DOM API Selectors API Level 1 __querySelector()__ __querySelectorAll()__ Document ELement IE8+, Firefox 3.5+, Safari 3.1+, Chrome Opera 10+ ### document.querySelector / Element.querySelector() - element = document.querySelector( selectors ) - selectors: css : div input ```
``` ``` var el = document.querySelector("div.user-panel.main input[name=login]"); ``` - element ____ element ( DOM ) - null - - Css - ID CSS JavaScript JavaScript querySelector : id foo\bar DOM ``` document.querySelector('#foo\\\\bar'); ``` #### document.querySelectorAll ( Element.querySelectorAll() ) - elementList = document.querySelectorAll(Selectors); - elementList __non-live__ NodeList . ( ) - selectors CSS. : class "note" / "alert" div ``` var matches = document.querySelectorAll("div.note, div.alert"); ``` - WebKit __bug__: selectors CSS, elementList ,. --- **NOTE!!** element.querySelector / element.querySelectorAll element ---- {% blockquote %} [MDN: NodeList](https://developer.mozilla.org/zh-CN/docs/Web/API/NodeList) [MDN: Document.querySelectorAll](https://developer.mozilla.org/zh-CN/docs/Web/API/Document/querySelectorAll) [MDN: Document.querySelector](https://developer.mozilla.org/zh-CN/docs/Web/API/Document/querySelector) _JS ( 3 )_ {% endblockquote %}
Post.raw:
--- title: querySelector categories: - tags: - DOM - date: 2016-12-03 --- , querySelector, MDN ### - DOM DOM DOM Selectors API HTML5, API , Element Traversal ( ) DOM - Selectors API W3C , CSS JS CSS DOM API Selectors API Level 1 __querySelector()__ __querySelectorAll()__ Document ELement IE8+, Firefox 3.5+, Safari 3.1+, Chrome Opera 10+ ### document.querySelector / Element.querySelector() - element = document.querySelector( selectors ) - selectors: css : div input ```
``` ``` var el = document.querySelector("div.user-panel.main input[name=login]"); ``` - element ____ element ( DOM ) - null - - Css - ID CSS JavaScript JavaScript querySelector : id foo\bar DOM ``` document.querySelector('#foo\\\\bar'); ``` #### document.querySelectorAll ( Element.querySelectorAll() ) - elementList = document.querySelectorAll(Selectors); - elementList __non-live__ NodeList . ( ) - selectors CSS. : class "note" / "alert" div ``` var matches = document.querySelectorAll("div.note, div.alert"); ``` - WebKit __bug__: selectors CSS, elementList ,. --- **NOTE!!** element.querySelector / element.querySelectorAll element ---- {% blockquote %} [MDN: NodeList](https://developer.mozilla.org/zh-CN/docs/Web/API/NodeList) [MDN: Document.querySelectorAll](https://developer.mozilla.org/zh-CN/docs/Web/API/Document/querySelectorAll) [MDN: Document.querySelector](https://developer.mozilla.org/zh-CN/docs/Web/API/Document/querySelector) _JS ( 3 )_ {% endblockquote %}

  - deploy git

  -  chorme  css js (  https://vivian-xu.github.io/fancybox/jquery.fancybox.css ) https://vivian-xu.github.io/hexo_test/***  issue  https://github.com/hexojs/hexo/issues/1121

    root (  CNAME )

   _config.yml

   ```
   url: http://yoursite.com
   root: /hexo_test/
   permalink: :year/:month/:day/:title/
   permalink_defaults:
   ```

  -  hexo g -d  

  
  ```
  # Hexo Configuration
  ## Docs: https://hexo.io/docs/configuration.html
  ## Source: https://github.com/hexojs/hexo/

  # Site 
  title: Vivian
  subtitle:
  description: Vvian's blog
  keywords:
    - HTML
    - JavaScript
    - CSS
    - React
  author: Vivian
  language: zh-CN #
  timezone: Asia/Shanghai #

  # URL
  ## If your site is put in a subdirectory, set url as 'http://yoursite.com/child' and root as '/child/'
  url: http://yoursite.com #, 
  root: /hexo_test/
  permalink: :year/:month/:day/:title/
  permalink_defaults:

  # Directory
  source_dir: source
  public_dir: public
  tag_dir: tags #
  archive_dir: archives  #
  category_dir: categories #
  code_dir: downloads/code
  i18n_dir: :lang
  skip_render:

  # Writing
  new_post_name: :title.md # File name of new posts
  default_layout: post #(post page photo draft)
  titlecase: false # Transform title into titlecase  #
  external_link: true # Open external links in new tab #
  filename_case: 0
  render_drafts: false
  post_asset_folder: false
  relative_link: false
  future: true
  highlight:  #
    enable: true
    line_number: true #
    auto_detect: false
    tab_replace:

  # Category & Tag
  default_category: uncategorized #
  category_map:
  tag_map:

  # Date / Time format
  ## Hexo uses Moment.js to parse and display date
  ## You can customize the date format as defined in
  ## http://momentjs.com/docs/#/displaying/format/
  date_format: YYYY-MM-DD
  time_format: HH:mm:ss

  # Pagination
  ## Set per_page to 0 to disable pagination
  per_page: 10
  pagination_dir: page

  # Extensions
  ## Plugins: https://hexo.io/plugins/
  ## Themes: https://hexo.io/themes/
  theme: landscape
  # theme: ninja

  # Deployment
  ## Docs: https://hexo.io/docs/deployment.html
  deploy:
    type: git
    # repository: git@github.com:vivian-xu/vivian-xu.github.io.git
    repository: git@github.com:vivian-xu/blog.git
    branch: gh-pages

  ```

#### theme 

-  theme, git clone theme/ theme_name 

-  _config.yml  theme
